hints.title: Wightman Reconstruction
hints.content:
1052: :label: thm-os-wightman-reconstruction
1053: 
1054: By the **Osterwalder-Schrader reconstruction theorem** (Osterwalder & Schrader, 1973, 1975), the verified axioms OS0-OS4 imply the existence of a **relativistic quantum Yang-Mills theory** in Minkowski spacetime $\mathbb{R}^{1,3}$ satisfying the Wightman axioms:
1055: 
1056: 1. **Relativistic covariance** (Poincaré symmetry)
1057: 2. **Spectrum condition** (positive energy)
1058: 3. **Locality** (microcausality)
1059: 4. **Vacuum state** exists and is unique
1060: 5. **Mass gap**: $m_{\text{gap}} = \frac{1}{2\sigma} > 0$
